it.hardware_software_needed: Gather other hardware and software needed
it.add_to_dl: Add to DLs for us_employees and respective city

office.schedule_keycard: Schedule a time to get new hire their keycard

office.mail_laptop_welcome_kit: Mail laptop and welcome kit (remote only)

operations.add_cta_ventra_rta: Add to CTA/Ventra or RTA (if applicable)
